name: Actors/Characters with the Same Name Trivia Game | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: This 'Tony' is one that Tony Danza has NOT played.
questions.explanation:
Tony Nicholson.

	His roles are: Tony Banta on "Taxi", Tony Micelli on "Who's the Boss?", and Tony Canetti on "Hudson Street". He's also played Tony DiMeo on "The Tony Danza Show".  (Tony Nicholson was a character played by Kate Mulgrew in the miniseries "The Word".)

questions.text: Tim Allen played this Tim on "Home Improvement".
questions.explanation:
Tim Taylor.

	Tim Taylor hosted a cable TV home improvement show called "Tool Time".

questions.text: Which of these actor/comedians has NOT had a regular TV sitcom (not miniseries) where their character had the same first name?
questions.explanation:
Bill Bixby.

	Bill Bixby was the lead in many sitcoms and dramas.  (He did play Willie Abbott in the miniseries "Rich Man, Poor Man", but that was a dramatic miniseries.  He also didn't go by Willie, but Bill [given name Wilfred].)  Of the others: Jerry Seinfeld played Jerry Seinfeld on "Seinfeld", Ellen DeGeneres played Ellen Morgan on "Ellen", and Dick Van Dyke played Dick Preston on "The New Dick Van Dyke Show" (1971).

questions.text: The character Doris Martin was played by this actress/singer:
questions.explanation:
Doris Day & Day.

	"The Doris Day Show", a light and fluffy sitcom, changed formats and producers almost every season.

questions.text: This Kate has played Kate Columbo and Kathryn Janeway:
questions.explanation:
Kate Mulgrew & Mulgrew.

	She reprises her role as Adm Kathryn Janeway in the latest "Star Trek" movie "Star Trek: Nemesis".

questions.text: "Hogan's Heroes": Col Robert Hogan was played by this late actor:
questions.explanation:
Robert Crane & Bob Crane & Crane.

	Col Hogan was usually called either "colonel" by his men or "Hogan" by his captors.

questions.text: Which of the following 'Lucy's was NOT played by Lucille Ball?
questions.explanation:
Lucy Van Pelt.

	Lucy Van Pelt is from the comic strip "Peanuts".

questions.text: This John has played John Hartman and John "Jack" Tripper:
questions.explanation:
John Ritter & Ritter.

	John Ritter is the son of a legendary country singing musician/actor Tex and his wife Dorothy.

questions.text: This Bob has played Bob Hartley and Bob McKay.
questions.explanation:
Bob Newhart & Robert Newhart & Newhart.

	One infamous drinking game is for everyone at the party to watch an episode of "The Bob Newhart Show" and to take a swig whenever the name Bob is mentioned.

questions.text: This Andy has played Andy Taylor and Andy Sawyer in two shows named after him.
questions.explanation:
Andy Griffith & Andrew Griffith & Griffith.

	He's most recently known for playing Ben Matlock in the series "Matlock" and in 12 "Matlock" TV movies.
